title: Brak the Barbarian Versus the Sorceress
description: Making his way south toward the gold land of Khurdisan, Brak must first traverse the desolate territory of the Manworm--a land gripped by terror of things unknown & awful--a land of unseen watchers & horrifying riddles--a land ravaged by the evil of Nordica Fire-Hair, the beautiful, hypnotic sorceress whose occult experiments include human sacrifice.
author: John Jakes
